title: Music stops playing when I lock my Pixel 3a, it started after the update to Android 11 Beta 3.
content: When the smartphone is unlocked, music plays without problems and without stopping.Sometimes when I lock my smartphone,the music stops playing, sometimes it starts to break.This doesn't always happen, but it happens very often.I can't figure out what the problem is, but I fixed The YouTube Music cache,reset the app settings, and it didn't help.
